Text:
Mundane finds himself cornered at the edge of the
arena.
Hah!
Let me tell you something...
I've only shown you 22-hundredths of my power...

No, I mean 2.44 ryo... Uh, three yards and eight
pounds...
Knots, gauss... Candela... Newtons?
...Ugh!
Dammit, it's no good!
These constant tweaks are making a mess of things.
I gotta refine the image I'm going for here...
Hey, Cid, open up! I got big news!

I suddenly hear Skel yelling and pounding on my
door.
It's a brisk summer morning.

(Maintaining relationships with others always comes
with trouble.)

(I'll never get why people actively seek out this
kind of annoyance.)

(The fact that this is the start of one of the few
remaining days of vacation really brings all
this to mind.)

(Just now I sounded like more of a "passive eminence"
who keeps his distance from everyone. Nice.)
I unlock the door and let him in.
H-Hey! I got a lead on some big money.
Get a load of this! It's Rose's wanted poster.

10 million zeni alive, and any useful info starts at
500 thousand.
Let's go catch her, man.
Why?
I'm strapped for cash.

I thought you raked it in with that "sure-win" match
of yours?
Aw, man, just shut the hell up.

Let's just leave it at me bein' broke, huh? Cuz that's
where I'm at now—I don't have a zeni to my name.
So that's it. No other reason. I just need money.
Hmm.

Naturally we'll be splittin' that fat reward two
ways...is what'd I normally say, but I know I can
count on you as my best bud.
It couldn't be any more annoying.

(I've been in support of the princess's flight for
freedom from the get-go.)

(Having the guts and spirit to say screw this and
stick a knife into a despicable fiance is something
I find extremely awesome.)

(Experiences like this don't come around every day,
so I was hoping to watch it all play out...)
Hm?

I randomly glance out the window and spy my sister
walking toward the dorm.
I have a bad feeling about this.

I take a second to consider which of the two would be
more of a pain.

Think of it as a win-win situation. Yeah, I'll be the
happy guy with the reward money.

But don't worry—your payoff is something that'll live
inside your heart forever...

The brilliant memory of runnin' all over the capital
under the summer sky, sheddin' blood, sweat, and
tears so I can get that fat bounty'll be the greatest
treasure of your life.
Experience is the greatest prize. You get it, right?
Ack!
Alright, let's begin Operation: Capture Rose!
By "begin," do ya mean—
There's no time, so we're going out this way.
Huh?! Uh, h-hold on a...!
Aaaaaah!!!
